title: Antonio Vivaldi - Argippo

[FLAC, TRACKS, COVERS, BOOKLET]

WORLD PREMIERE RECORDING of VivaldiÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s long-lost opera, unearthed for the first time in 279 years.

Label: Dynamic

Year: 2008

Performers:

Argippo: Veronika Fucikova, mezzo-soprano
Zanaida: Pavla Stepnickova, mezzosoprano
Osira: Jana Binova-Koucka, soprano
Silvero: Barbora Sojkova, soprano
Tisifaro: Zdenek Kapl, baritone

Ensemble: Hofmusici; Ondrej Macek, director

VivaldiÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s long-lost (279 years) opera as a world premiere on CD by Dynamic. Hofmusici is a Czech period-instrument ensemble of young musicians specializing in the performance of baroque music. Only about two-thirds of it have survived the centuries, and Mr Macek used other arias from Vivaldi to fit the preserved text. After its first performance in Prague in May, Mr. Macek and his Hofmusici orchestra opted for Teatro Goldoni in Venice, where this new Dynamic CD has been recorded.
